div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1004 Kerch' (anc. Panticapaeum), Crimea (557) oblast, Ukraine, 1907? Burial: late 5th-early 4th cent. B.C. Contents: 200-300 AR Panticapaeum: AR (type unknown) Samos: AR (type unknown) Disposition: Leningrad (part, merged with main coll.) Bertier de la Garde, NS(Russian) 1911, p. 37, note
